title: Fragment, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: 4&1 satin patterned with areas of plain weave and brocaded with supplementary weft
description: Dark blue fabric patterned with vines and brocaded with gold in a design of the leg of a strong bird.
